## âœ… MVP Checklist

### Core Features

- [ ] User can register and login
- [ ] User can reset password via email
- [ ] User can practice Reading exercises
- [ ] User can practice Listening exercises
- [ ] Exercises are auto-graded (R/L)
- [ ] Auto-save works during practice
- [ ] User can take mock exam (4 skills)
- [ ] Mock exam has 172-minute timer
- [ ] Auto-submit when time expires
- [ ] User can view detailed results
- [ ] Dashboard shows progress stats
- [ ] User can view practice history
- [ ] User can update profile

### Technical Requirements

- [ ] API response < 500ms
- [ ] Page load < 3 seconds
- [ ] Mobile responsive
- [ ] Input validation working
- [ ] Error handling implemented
- [ ] Basic security measures
